a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:3041:"

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}

The {$blog_name} Team

To navigate there manually go to

Menu > My Stuff > My Account > Subscriptions (Blue Below Your Profile).

*If you do not have the Sub Accounts option on the subscriptions page, please email me at Patrick@POWLAX.com.

I’m excited to welcome you to POWLAX and the {$product_name}.  Thank you for making POWLAX a part of your lacrosse journey!

column36: POWLAX Online Skills Academy for Skyline Spartans
column45: $200/yr - No retreat, no surrender; that is Spartan law. And by Spartan law we will stand and fight...
column61:
a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:0;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:2188:"

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

";}}

column2: POWLAX Team HQ Creation Fee
column3:
Welcome to the Online Skills Academy Team Registration Portal Before you begin the registration process, please review the following information:
  • Intent to Enroll: By registering, you are submitting a deposit that demonstrates your intent to give the parents of your program the opportunity to register for the Online Skills Academy at discounted pricing for your team. This initial step reserves your team’s spot in our upcoming program.  The deposit is non-refundable, but will be put toward registration for team or coach training upon the completion of the Team Registration period.
  • Team Coordination: This registration is designed for team leads or administrators who are ready to share this opportunity with their team members. Once you complete your registration, you will receive a confirmation that you can share with your team to keep everyone informed about the upcoming enrollment process.
  • Next Steps:
    • After registering, you will be sent to a Google Form.  Please submit all information in the Google Form so I can begin creating your teams registration and marketing material.
    • Please have a date in mind for announcing the Online Skills Academy registration to your team.  The discounted registration coupon code will be live for no longer than 7 days.
  • Need Help? If you have any questions or require assistance during the registration process, our support team is available to help.  Please email Patrick@powlax.com with any questions.
By proceeding, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this information and are ready to secure your team’s place in the Online Skills Academy. Ready to get started? Click the registration button below to submit your intent!
column36: Team/Club Online Skills Academy Deposit
column45: After submitting this registration, you’ll receive a follow-up to complete your team’s full setup, which includes an annual registration fee of $249.99 per team.
column48:
✅ Team Registration Received!

Thanks for submitting your team registration — I’m pumped to have you on board!

Over the next few days, I’ll be setting up your custom POWLAX Team environment. You can expect your team page and login access to be fully ready within one week.

Once your setup is complete, you’ll receive:

  • ✅ A direct link to your team’s tracking dashboard

  • ✅ Player login instructions

  • ✅ The option to unlock full-year access and/or add a Team Strategy Page

This is going to be a game-changer for your program.

Giving your players a place to log their workouts, compete on leaderboards, and access your team’s strategy resources will create a level of accountability and organization that’s hard to find anywhere else. I can’t wait to help you and your team get started.

Talk soon,
Patrick Chapla
Founder, POWLAX

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

column2: POWLAX Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Class for 3 Coaches
column3: This registration give you and 2 other coaches access to the POWLAX Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Classes.
column36: 3 Lacrosse Coaches Master Class Membership
column45: This registration is for you and 2 coaches!
column61:
a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:2977:"

Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}

Please make sure to read through this email completely to get the most out of your experience with POWLAX.

You can login here: {$login_page}

Using this username and password:

Username: {$username}

Password: The password you set up during registration.

Accessing the POWLAX Playbook PDF’s

As a part of {$product_name}, you now have access to all of the POWLAX Playbook PDF’s.  To download the PDF’s, log in to POWLAX.com and use the menu to navigate to a strategy or drill video using the Coaches Corner Footer Menu click the red pdf button under the video to download the Playbook PDF that corresponds to the video.

Giving Coaches Access to the Master Classes

You can give your coaches additional coaches access to the POWLAX Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Classes by following the directions in this video Adding Coaches and Players to Team Master Classes or the list below.

Step 1 - Log in to POWLAX.com.

Step 2 : Click this link - https://powlax.com/account/?action=subscriptions

Step 3 - Scroll down, below your profile and find the row that says "POWLAX Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Class for 3 Coaches".  Click the Sub Accounts Button in the Far Right Column.

Step 4 - Add your coaches by entering their information into the fields or send them the registration link at the bottom of the page so they can register themselves.

To navigate there manually go to

My Stuff > My account > Subscriptions > Click the Sub Accounts button on the right side of the screen.  You will then be able to add your Sub Accounts.

If you do not have the Sub Accounts option on the subscriptions page, please email me at Patrick@POWLAX.com.

Accessing the POWLAX Master Classes

Navigating to the Master Classes by going to My Stuff > My Masterclasses.

Thanks again for purchasing {$product_name} and making POWLAX a part of your lacrosse journey! Together, let's continue to inspire and elevate the game we all love!

If you have any questions, concerns or issues with the Master Classes, please shoot me a text (720)212-4322 or email Patrick@powlax.com

- Patrick Chapla

";}}

column36: cPOWLAX Online Skills Academy for Glen Ellyn Bulldogs Lacrosse
column61:
a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:3041:"

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***
Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

column2: The Player and Parents Guide to Lacrosse - Paperback
column3:
ACCELERATE YOUR LACROSSE LEARNING

  • LEARN THE GAME FASTER
  • MENS AND WOMENS LACROSSE
  • SAVE TIME AND MONEY
  • FIND THE RIGHT PLACE TO PLAY
  • JUMPSTART SKILL DEVELOPMENT
  • QR LINKS TO VIDEO CONTENT
BUY NOW https://youtu.be/Ok4R6EyhM8w

Watch the Trailer!

PATRICK CHAPLA is the founder of POWLAX, a lacrosse brand focused on inspiring young players and ensuring they enjoy playing the sport. His coaches training videos have been viewed over 2 million times and have helped thousands of coaches create excellent environments for their players.

Train at Home!

  Clear explanations, helpful pictures, and QR codes that reference videos make training at home easy!   Includes position specific strategies and skills for Attack, Midfield, Defense, Goalie, Face off His content is awesome, and there is nothing out there like it" Bryan InagakiDirector - Avon Grove Youth Lacrosse BUY NOW

The Player and Parents Guide to Lacrosse

This book is a must-have guide for lacrosse players and parents. It's perfect for anyone looking to learn and excel in the exciting sport of lacrosse. It covers everything you need to know about the game, including its history, rules and regulations, the field, and the flow of play. With clear and concise explanations, helpful pictures, and QR codes that reference videos, this book is an indispensable resource for learning the essential skills of men's and women's lacrosse like how to hold the stick, pick up ground balls, cradle, pass, catch, fake, dodge, and shoot. It also includes position-specific dodges and the basics of defense, goalie, and face-off play. In addition to teaching the fundamentals, this book offers practical advice on how to choose equipment, find places to play, and ways to practice at home. This book is everything you need to fall in love with lacrosse.

a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:3041:"

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***
Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

column61:
a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:4410:"

Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}

Please make sure to read through this email completely to get the most out of your experience with POWLAX.

You can login here: {$login_page}

Using this username and password:

Username: {$username}

Password: The password you set up during registration.

Information for Everyone

Accessing the POWLAX Playbook PDF’s

As a part of {$product_name}, you now have access to all of the POWLAX Playbook PDF’s.  To download the PDF’s, log in to POWLAX.com and use the “Coaches Corner” in the footer menu to navigate to a strategy or drill video. Click the red pdf button under the video to download the Playbook PDF that corresponds to the video. PDF’s can also be found in the Materials Section of Master Class Lessons.

Accessing Your Master Classes

Access {$product_name} by clicking this link (My Master Classes while logged in to POWLAX.com. 

To get there manually, login to POWLAX.com > Go to My Stuff > My Master Classes in any header menu.

For Coaches

Adding your Players and Coaches to Your Account

To add your players/coaches to your Team Master Class or Online Skills Academy, Click Here “My Subscriptions", then click the “Blue Sub Accounts Button in the right column of your Team Master Class Row.   You can add them manually or allow them to register themselves by sending the link on the bottom of the page.

Please make sure you are logged in when you click the link or it will not work.

To navigate there manually go to

Menu > My Stuff > My Account > Subscriptions (Blue Below Your Profile).

*If you do not have the Sub Accounts option on the subscriptions page, please email me at Patrick@POWLAX.com.

I’m excited to welcome you to POWLAX and the {$product_name}.  Thank you for making POWLAX a part of your lacrosse journey!

- Patrick Chapla

";}}

a:1:{s:27:"MeprUserProductWelcomeEmail";a:4:{s:7:"enabled";b:1;s:12:"use_template";b:1;s:7:"subject";s:40:"** Thanks for Purchasing {$product_name}";s:4:"body";s:3041:"

Thank you for registering for {$product_name}! We're thrilled to have you here.

There are 3 important things you'll need to know as you get started!

Important Pages

  1. Your Profile - This is where you can track your progress as you complete workouts within the portal.
  2. Ranks - Level up as you complete drills and challenges. Your rank reflects your overall effort and dedication, showcasing the total work you've put in along your journey to becoming a stronger player.
  3. Badges - Earn badges by completing workouts that build specific skills important to each position. Don't know which Achievement to unlock first?  Take the 6-Question Lax Skill Check to find out!  It's totally free!
  4. Drill Bank - The Drill Bank is a collection of drills used to build skills without Gamification.
  5. Navigating Positional Workouts - Once you are in the Workout Section of the Portal, navigating between positions can be tricky.  There are Positional Navigation Pages found in the first option of the back-end menu that helps you to move between sections.

Not sure what you should work on?

Take the 6-question Lax Skill Check - It's completely free and will create a personalized report of which workouts will best help you reach your lacrosse goals!

Log in Info

You can log in here: {$login_page}
Using this username and password:
Username: {$username}
Password: *** Password you set during signup ***

Cheers!
The {$blog_name} Team

column2: Free POWLAX Online Skills Academy Basics Membership
column3:
Try 5 POWLAX Online Skills Academy for with this membership, you get access to:

  • Solid Start Workout - Picking Up and Passing: A fun way to begin your training.

  • Attack Workout - Up The Hash Dodging: Master your moves and finishing dodges from behind the cage!

  • Midfeild Workout - Master Split Dodge and Shooting on the Run - Learn to control the middle part of your game

  • Defense Workout - Approaches, Defending at X, and Long Passes - Master defensive basics with this workout!

  • Wall Ball Workout - Master Fundamentals: Keep the most important skills dialed in with this wall ball workout!

These workouts are designed to help you learn new skills while having a great time.

column48:
Welcome to the Red Hawks Team HQ! You’re all set—Here’s what you can expect inside the new Team HQ:

  • Join Your Team: Menu > My Stuff > My Teams.
    • You have access to the Red Hawks Lacrosse Club HQ and can automatically join your corresponding Red Hawks Team HQ (8U, 10U, 12U, 14U).  You will go straight to the Club HQ when you log in.

In the Team HQ, you will find.

  • Team Leaderboard – Friendly competition fuels progress. Players earn points for logging self-guided workouts or completing workouts in the Online Skills Academy! Rankings refresh daily so they can track their improvement.
  • Team Playbook – Upgrade your lacrosse IQ with a series of videos and playbook pdf’s that teach the game!  Videos clips and diagrams make it easy for players (and parents!) to excel!
  • POWLAX Online Skills Academy - Free Basic Access – Every player on the roster gets entry to 5 free guided workouts! Perfect for extra reps at home.
    • Track Progress, Earn Points, Badges, Ranks - Get credit for every workout and rep by doing Online Skills Academy Workouts or logging the work you put in on your own!
  • Activity Feed – A private, team‑only stream where coaches can post updates, and the players' progress in the POWLAX Online Skills Academy will show up.  No outsiders, no clutter—just the info you need.

Other Quick Hits

  • Account Page:
    • Manage - Your Information, Subscriptions, and Payments.
    • Profile - Customize your Avatar and Cover Photo.
    • Access - Team HQ, Playbook, and Online Skills Academy
    • POWLAX.com

Need help? Just reply to this email—we’ve got you.

See you inside,

The POWLAX Crew

column2: Create My POWLAX Family Account
column3:
This membership creates your family account.

When you register for this account, your account will receive a "Parent" role, which will give you all parent capabilities.

You will then create a Sub Account for your child, which will receive the "Child" role.  When an account gets the "Child" role, the profile will be automatically hidden from any directories, they will not be able to post on Team Discussion Boards, Send or Receive Messages.
column9: POWLAX Family Account Featured Image (1)|POWLAX Family Account Featured Image
column36: Create My POWLAX Family Account
column48: Thank you for creating your POWLAX Family Account!  Let's get your child added to the account. Add Your Child To The Account Read the directions below to create your child's account.  Copy and paste somewhere for reference if you want. Step 1: Click the link in step 5 to go to the subscriptions page of your profile.  There you will create an account for your child. Step 2: Scroll down to find your "Create My POWLAX Family Account" Subscription. Step 3: Click "Sub Accounts" in the right column of that row. Step 4: Follow the directions to create a profile for your child. Step 5: Click this link to go to the "Subscriptions" page on your profile!   Feel free to email me at info@powlax.com if you have any issues.

column2: POWLAX Child Account Membership
column3:
Note: This membership gives the current account the "child" status or creates a "child" account if you're not logged in.  It does not register you for a Team or Club HQ. Make this a "child" status: Submit the form below. Create a new "child" account: Log out > return to this page > register the new account. Child Account Membership: Provides limited access for users under 18. This membership assigns the ‘child’ role, which makes the account unsearchable to users outside of their groups and restricts access to forums, messaging, and activity feeds for safety. Child members can still access course content and participate in groups, but with enhanced privacy protections. Perfect for younger users who need supervised learning environments.
  • This membership gives the account enhanced privacy protections.
  • This account will not have access to forums, messaging, or public activity feeds
  • The profile is private and not searchable by members outside of your Club HQ, Team HQ, or Group.
  • They can still access all learning content and participate in moderated group activities
Creating a New Account for a child account:  The "Child" account status can only be changed by POWLAX Admin. If you need to adjust this or have questions about the child account restrictions, please email info@powlax.com

column2: POWLAX Community Groups and Forums
column3: Submit this membership to gain access to the POWLAX Community Groups and Forums!
column9: POWLAX Community Groups and Discussion Photo|1|POWLAX Club Team Cover Photo
column36: Join the POWLAX Forum Discussions!
column48:
You’ve just unlocked the new POWLAX Community & Forums—a space where coaches, players, parents, and directors can swap ideas, troubleshoot problems, and celebrate wins in real time. Our drills, playbooks, and videos already help lacrosse families everywhere; now we finally have one home to connect and grow together.

Why This Space Matters

  • Fresh Perspectives, Shared Wins — Bring your questions or a drill that worked yesterday. Every post adds to a growing knowledge base.

  • Direct Access to the POWLAX Team — We keep an eye on the threads, so you can get feedback straight from the source.

  • Early Shaping Power — Because the forum is still ramping up, your contributions will steer the culture and the next round of resources.

Your First 3 Moves

  1. Complete Your Profile - Add a short bio—who you are, what you do in lacrosse, and any specialties—so other members know exactly when to tag you or reach out with questions. Edit your profile now - https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/profile/

  2. Introduce Yourself
    In the Introductions channel, share where you play or coach and one challenge you’re tackling this season.

A Few Simple Ground Rules

  • Stay Constructive — The goal is growth, not gotchas.

  • Share Proof — Clips, stats, or field results make advice clearer for everyone.

  • Keep It Fun — A lively meme or highlight clip is always welcome.

Thanks for helping build something special from the ground up. Your insight today will lift the next generation of lacrosse families tomorrow.

See you in the threads!

Patrick Chapla
Founder, POWLAX

column2: Coach Essentials Kit
column3: Your Starting Point for Smarter Coaching. Get the fundamental tools to understand your team's needs and start implementing effective strategies right away. This annual membership provides access to essential resources to build your coaching foundation.
column36: Coach Essentials Kit
column48:
Hi {$user_first_name}, Welcome to the POWLAX Coach Essentials Kit! We're thrilled to have you as part of our community and are excited to help you elevate your coaching game. All of your resources are available through the sections on your profile page > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/profile/

Free Resources:

Coach Mastery Assessment: "Know Where to Start." Identify your team's current standing and get recommendations for relevant free training videos

Lacrosse Community and Discussion: "You’re Not Coaching Alone." Join the POWLAX community forums for discussions, shared drills, and Q&A.

Coaching Resources

Printable Playbooks: "Grab-and-Go Visuals” matching POWLAX video content for easy sideline use.  Download them from the POWLAX Video Pages.

Digital Playbook (Lacrosse Lab - Individual Addition): "Interactive Teaching Tools." Digital play and drill diagrams for interactive sessions with your players or staff. You’ll receive an invite email within 2 days of your registration. For the most part, I get to it in an hour or 2. If you don’t receive your invite within a day or 2, just shoot us an email at info@powlax.com.

Parent Communication Pack: "Coach the Sideline Too." Pre-written emails and guidelines to build trust with families Download Here > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/my-resources/downloads/

Lacrosse Skill Verbiage Cheat Sheet: "Talk Like a Pro." Standardized terms and cues for efficient fundamental teaching. Download Here > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/my-resources/downloads/

We're excited to see the impact you'll make this season! Best regards, The POWLAX Team

You’ll receive an invite email within 2 days of your registration. For the most part, I get to it in an hour or 2. If you don’t receive your invite within a day or 2, just shoot us an email at info@powlax.com.

Parent Communication Pack: "Coach the Sideline Too." Pre-written emails and guidelines to build trust with families
Download Here > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/my-resources/downloads/

Lacrosse Skill Verbiage Cheat Sheet: "Talk Like a Pro." Standardized terms and cues for efficient fundamental teaching.
Download Here > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/my-resources/downloads/

Coaches Training: "Coach Smarter, Not Harder." Access the full Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Class with 40+ video lessons covering practice planning, skill teaching, team management, and upcoming age-specific Boot Camps.
Access Coaches Training Here > https://powlax.com/members/{$username}/my-resources/coaching-master-class/

Strategy Playbook: "Teach the System." A complete library of strategy videos and printable PDFs covering every phase of the game and all core fundamentals.
Contained within the Youth Lacrosse Coaching Master Class.

We're excited to see the impact you'll make this season!

Best regards,
The POWLAX Team

";}}
